Remodeling your home and need a place to store your furniture or excess household items?  Putting your home up for sale? A PODS container can provide you with a secure storage option to store extra belongings so you can renovate or stage your home with ease! PODS containers are not only affordable, they are convenient. You can store onsite or in one of our secure PODS storage centers. You decide how long you will keep your PODS storage container and when you will need it back. 
If you are moving, PODS containers are an ideal solution. Delivered right to your door, they are available in three sizes. Since PODS containers sit at ground level, loading and unloading items is convenient too. There are no ramps or steps to navigate. With PODS you can take your time (weeks if needed) and alleviate the stress. Once all of your personal belongings are packed and loaded, provide your own lock on the roll-down door and you keep the key. PODS will retrieve the container and transport it to your new home or back to a local Storage Center until you are ready for your belongings to be delivered to your new home. PODS offers 24-hour service, it takes just one telephone call for re-delivery of the PODS container and your belongings – across town or across the country.

Founded in 1939, Osborne Machinery Movers Inc. is one of the leading providers of machinery and plant moving services in the southeastern United States. Located in Birmingham, Ala., the company's services include machinery moving, plant relocation, crane and equipment rentals, machinery warehousing, custom crating and metal distribution. The company caters to several markets which include machine shops, print shops, foundries, major hospitals, paper mills and automotive manufacturing facilities. The company's equipment includes forklifts with capacities ranging from 4,000 to 80,000 pounds, cranes and other specialized rigging equipment.

We encourage YOU to "ASK around" before making a moving DECISION. ONCE YOU Begin asking the right questions. Then YOU will quickly SEE HOW we quietly became the oldest and most respected moving team in birmingham and the entire southeast by winning over ONE Family AT a TIME. TRANSPARENT billing practices = we DO NOT charge extra for anything!  
 
 
YOU won't find ANY surprises on your final bill which sadly has become a standard within OUR industry. OUR quoted hourly rate is exactly what YOU will END UP paying AT the END of your local MOVE. (TOTAL time X hourly rate = final invoice)   
 
 
OUR competitors will tack on "hidden fees" disguised AS service charges. Fuel surcharges. Delivery fees. Special handling of high value or heavy item charges. "PER step" charges for multilevel houses and apartments and a multitude of other things that we deem unnecessary. Transparency and uniqueness: 
 
 
we disassembled and reassembled ALL Beds and cribs on the DAY of your move. ALL mirrors. Marble tops and glass shelves are removed and carefully wrapped by US on the DAY of your move. YOU'LL find most other moving companies require YOU to USE a THIRD-PARTY Company to crate these items which is more money OUT of your POCKET. ALL appliances are disconnected and reconnected by US on the DAY of your move with a simply release of liability. Again, a large majority of other moving companies will require YOU to utilize a third party to disconnect large appliances (washer. Dryer. Refrigerator). We DO NOT charge extra for pianos. Organs or fine antiques. In fact. Ellis piano in Hoover has been recommending OUR services since 1983 when we saved the DAY for David on a 4TH floor and highly complex grand piano DELIVERY. OUR team trained directly with Steinway & sons and we are the only recommended piano mover by their organization in north & central Alabama. UAB. Samford. Birmingham southern and Montevallo ALL utilize US when needing a piano moved. What we SAY is what YOU GET! we tend to ASK a FEW more questions from OUR customers because every move requires a different approach. But by getting to know OUR customers and fostering relationships. We know that YOU will END UP becoming a customer for life.

Remodeling your home and need a place to store your furniture or excess household items?  Putting your home up for sale? A PODS container can provide you with a secure storage option to store extra belongings so you can renovate or stage your home with ease! PODS containers are not only affordable, they are convenient. You can store onsite or in one of our secure PODS storage centers. You decide how long you will keep your PODS storage container and when you will need it back. 
If you are moving, PODS containers are an ideal solution. Delivered right to your door, they are available in three sizes. Since PODS containers sit at ground level, loading and unloading items is convenient too. There are no ramps or steps to navigate. With PODS you can take your time (weeks if needed) and alleviate the stress. Once all of your personal belongings are packed and loaded, provide your own lock on the roll-down door and you keep the key. PODS will retrieve the container and transport it to your new home or back to a local Storage Center until you are ready for your belongings to be delivered to your new home. PODS offers 24-hour service, it takes just one telephone call for re-delivery of the PODS container and your belongings – across town or across the country.

Remodeling your home and need a place to store your furniture or excess household items?  Putting your home up for sale? A PODS container can provide you with a secure storage option to store extra belongings so you can renovate or stage your home with ease! PODS containers are not only affordable, they are convenient. You can store onsite or in one of our secure PODS storage centers. You decide how long you will keep your PODS storage container and when you will need it back. 
If you are moving, PODS containers are an ideal solution. Delivered right to your door, they are available in three sizes. Since PODS containers sit at ground level, loading and unloading items is convenient too. There are no ramps or steps to navigate. With PODS you can take your time (weeks if needed) and alleviate the stress. Once all of your personal belongings are packed and loaded, provide your own lock on the roll-down door and you keep the key. PODS will retrieve the container and transport it to your new home or back to a local Storage Center until you are ready for your belongings to be delivered to your new home. PODS offers 24-hour service, it takes just one telephone call for re-delivery of the PODS container and your belongings – across town or across the country.

Founded in 1939, Osborne Machinery Movers Inc. is one of the leading providers of machinery and plant moving services in the southeastern United States. Located in Birmingham, Ala., the company's services include machinery moving, plant relocation, crane and equipment rentals, machinery warehousing, custom crating and metal distribution. The company caters to several markets which include machine shops, print shops, foundries, major hospitals, paper mills and automotive manufacturing facilities. The company's equipment includes forklifts with capacities ranging from 4,000 to 80,000 pounds, cranes and other specialized rigging equipment.

We encourage YOU to "ASK around" before making a moving DECISION. ONCE YOU Begin asking the right questions. Then YOU will quickly SEE HOW we quietly became the oldest and most respected moving team in birmingham and the entire southeast by winning over ONE Family AT a TIME. TRANSPARENT billing practices = we DO NOT charge extra for anything!  
 
 
YOU won't find ANY surprises on your final bill which sadly has become a standard within OUR industry. OUR quoted hourly rate is exactly what YOU will END UP paying AT the END of your local MOVE. (TOTAL time X hourly rate = final invoice)   
 
 
OUR competitors will tack on "hidden fees" disguised AS service charges. Fuel surcharges. Delivery fees. Special handling of high value or heavy item charges. "PER step" charges for multilevel houses and apartments and a multitude of other things that we deem unnecessary. Transparency and uniqueness: 
 
 
we disassembled and reassembled ALL Beds and cribs on the DAY of your move. ALL mirrors. Marble tops and glass shelves are removed and carefully wrapped by US on the DAY of your move. YOU'LL find most other moving companies require YOU to USE a THIRD-PARTY Company to crate these items which is more money OUT of your POCKET. ALL appliances are disconnected and reconnected by US on the DAY of your move with a simply release of liability. Again, a large majority of other moving companies will require YOU to utilize a third party to disconnect large appliances (washer. Dryer. Refrigerator). We DO NOT charge extra for pianos. Organs or fine antiques. In fact. Ellis piano in Hoover has been recommending OUR services since 1983 when we saved the DAY for David on a 4TH floor and highly complex grand piano DELIVERY. OUR team trained directly with Steinway & sons and we are the only recommended piano mover by their organization in north & central Alabama. UAB. Samford. Birmingham southern and Montevallo ALL utilize US when needing a piano moved. What we SAY is what YOU GET! we tend to ASK a FEW more questions from OUR customers because every move requires a different approach. But by getting to know OUR customers and fostering relationships. We know that YOU will END UP becoming a customer for life.

Remodeling your home and need a place to store your furniture or excess household items?  Putting your home up for sale? A PODS container can provide you with a secure storage option to store extra belongings so you can renovate or stage your home with ease! PODS containers are not only affordable, they are convenient. You can store onsite or in one of our secure PODS storage centers. You decide how long you will keep your PODS storage container and when you will need it back. 
If you are moving, PODS containers are an ideal solution. Delivered right to your door, they are available in three sizes. Since PODS containers sit at ground level, loading and unloading items is convenient too. There are no ramps or steps to navigate. With PODS you can take your time (weeks if needed) and alleviate the stress. Once all of your personal belongings are packed and loaded, provide your own lock on the roll-down door and you keep the key. PODS will retrieve the container and transport it to your new home or back to a local Storage Center until you are ready for your belongings to be delivered to your new home. PODS offers 24-hour service, it takes just one telephone call for re-delivery of the PODS container and your belongings – across town or across the country.

Founded in 1939, Osborne Machinery Movers Inc. is one of the leading providers of machinery and plant moving services in the southeastern United States. Located in Birmingham, Ala., the company's services include machinery moving, plant relocation, crane and equipment rentals, machinery warehousing, custom crating and metal distribution. The company caters to several markets which include machine shops, print shops, foundries, major hospitals, paper mills and automotive manufacturing facilities. The company's equipment includes forklifts with capacities ranging from 4,000 to 80,000 pounds, cranes and other specialized rigging equipment.

We encourage YOU to "ASK around" before making a moving DECISION. ONCE YOU Begin asking the right questions. Then YOU will quickly SEE HOW we quietly became the oldest and most respected moving team in birmingham and the entire southeast by winning over ONE Family AT a TIME. TRANSPARENT billing practices = we DO NOT charge extra for anything!  
 
 
YOU won't find ANY surprises on your final bill which sadly has become a standard within OUR industry. OUR quoted hourly rate is exactly what YOU will END UP paying AT the END of your local MOVE. (TOTAL time X hourly rate = final invoice)   
 
 
OUR competitors will tack on "hidden fees" disguised AS service charges. Fuel surcharges. Delivery fees. Special handling of high value or heavy item charges. "PER step" charges for multilevel houses and apartments and a multitude of other things that we deem unnecessary. Transparency and uniqueness: 
 
 
we disassembled and reassembled ALL Beds and cribs on the DAY of your move. ALL mirrors. Marble tops and glass shelves are removed and carefully wrapped by US on the DAY of your move. YOU'LL find most other moving companies require YOU to USE a THIRD-PARTY Company to crate these items which is more money OUT of your POCKET. ALL appliances are disconnected and reconnected by US on the DAY of your move with a simply release of liability. Again, a large majority of other moving companies will require YOU to utilize a third party to disconnect large appliances (washer. Dryer. Refrigerator). We DO NOT charge extra for pianos. Organs or fine antiques. In fact. Ellis piano in Hoover has been recommending OUR services since 1983 when we saved the DAY for David on a 4TH floor and highly complex grand piano DELIVERY. OUR team trained directly with Steinway & sons and we are the only recommended piano mover by their organization in north & central Alabama. UAB. Samford. Birmingham southern and Montevallo ALL utilize US when needing a piano moved. What we SAY is what YOU GET! we tend to ASK a FEW more questions from OUR customers because every move requires a different approach. But by getting to know OUR customers and fostering relationships. We know that YOU will END UP becoming a customer for life.

Remodeling your home and need a place to store your furniture or excess household items?  Putting your home up for sale? A PODS container can provide you with a secure storage option to store extra belongings so you can renovate or stage your home with ease! PODS containers are not only affordable, they are convenient. You can store onsite or in one of our secure PODS storage centers. You decide how long you will keep your PODS storage container and when you will need it back. 
If you are moving, PODS containers are an ideal solution. Delivered right to your door, they are available in three sizes. Since PODS containers sit at ground level, loading and unloading items is convenient too. There are no ramps or steps to navigate. With PODS you can take your time (weeks if needed) and alleviate the stress. Once all of your personal belongings are packed and loaded, provide your own lock on the roll-down door and you keep the key. PODS will retrieve the container and transport it to your new home or back to a local Storage Center until you are ready for your belongings to be delivered to your new home. PODS offers 24-hour service, it takes just one telephone call for re-delivery of the PODS container and your belongings – across town or across the country.

Founded in 1939, Osborne Machinery Movers Inc. is one of the leading providers of machinery and plant moving services in the southeastern United States. Located in Birmingham, Ala., the company's services include machinery moving, plant relocation, crane and equipment rentals, machinery warehousing, custom crating and metal distribution. The company caters to several markets which include machine shops, print shops, foundries, major hospitals, paper mills and automotive manufacturing facilities. The company's equipment includes forklifts with capacities ranging from 4,000 to 80,000 pounds, cranes and other specialized rigging equipment.

We encourage YOU to "ASK around" before making a moving DECISION. ONCE YOU Begin asking the right questions. Then YOU will quickly SEE HOW we quietly became the oldest and most respected moving team in birmingham and the entire southeast by winning over ONE Family AT a TIME. TRANSPARENT billing practices = we DO NOT charge extra for anything!  
 
 
YOU won't find ANY surprises on your final bill which sadly has become a standard within OUR industry. OUR quoted hourly rate is exactly what YOU will END UP paying AT the END of your local MOVE. (TOTAL time X hourly rate = final invoice)   
 
 
OUR competitors will tack on "hidden fees" disguised AS service charges. Fuel surcharges. Delivery fees. Special handling of high value or heavy item charges. "PER step" charges for multilevel houses and apartments and a multitude of other things that we deem unnecessary. Transparency and uniqueness: 
 
 
we disassembled and reassembled ALL Beds and cribs on the DAY of your move. ALL mirrors. Marble tops and glass shelves are removed and carefully wrapped by US on the DAY of your move. YOU'LL find most other moving companies require YOU to USE a THIRD-PARTY Company to crate these items which is more money OUT of your POCKET. ALL appliances are disconnected and reconnected by US on the DAY of your move with a simply release of liability. Again, a large majority of other moving companies will require YOU to utilize a third party to disconnect large appliances (washer. Dryer. Refrigerator). We DO NOT charge extra for pianos. Organs or fine antiques. In fact. Ellis piano in Hoover has been recommending OUR services since 1983 when we saved the DAY for David on a 4TH floor and highly complex grand piano DELIVERY. OUR team trained directly with Steinway & sons and we are the only recommended piano mover by their organization in north & central Alabama. UAB. Samford. Birmingham southern and Montevallo ALL utilize US when needing a piano moved. What we SAY is what YOU GET! we tend to ASK a FEW more questions from OUR customers because every move requires a different approach. But by getting to know OUR customers and fostering relationships. We know that YOU will END UP becoming a customer for life.

A PODS container can provide you with a secure storage option to store extra belongings so you can renovate or stage your home with ease! PODS containers are not only affordable, they are convenient. You can store onsite or in one of our secure PODS storage centers. You decide how long you will keep your PODS storage container and when you will need it back. 
If you are moving, PODS containers are an ideal solution. Delivered right to your door, they are available in three sizes. Since PODS containers sit at ground level, loading and unloading items is convenient too. There are no ramps or steps to navigate. With PODS you can take your time (weeks if needed) and alleviate the stress. Once all of your personal belongings are packed and loaded, provide your own lock on the roll-down door and you keep the key. PODS will retrieve the container and transport it to your new home or back to a local Storage Center until you are ready for your belongings to be delivered to your new home. PODS offers 24-hour service, it takes just one telephone call for re-delivery of the PODS container and your belongings – across town or across the country.

Founded in 1939, Osborne Machinery Movers Inc. is one of the leading providers of machinery and plant moving services in the southeastern United States. Located in Birmingham, Ala., the company's services include machinery moving, plant relocation, crane and equipment rentals, machinery warehousing, custom crating and metal distribution. We encourage YOU to "ASK around" before making a moving DECISION. ONCE YOU Begin asking the right questions. Then YOU will quickly SEE HOW we quietly became the oldest and most respected moving team in birmingham and the entire southeast by winning over ONE Family AT a TIME. TRANSPARENT billing practices = we DO NOT charge extra for anything!  
 
 
YOU won't find ANY surprises on your final bill which sadly has become a standard within OUR industry. OUR quoted hourly rate is exactly what YOU will END UP paying AT the END of your local MOVE. (TOTAL time X hourly rate = final invoice)   
 
 
OUR competitors will tack on "hidden fees" disguised AS service charges. Fuel surcharges. Delivery fees. Special handling of high value or heavy item charges. "PER step" charges for multilevel houses and apartments and a multitude of other things that we deem unnecessary. Transparency and uniqueness: 
 
 
we disassembled and reassembled ALL Beds and cribs on the DAY of your move. ALL mirrors. Marble tops and glass shelves are removed and carefully wrapped by US on the DAY of your move. YOU'LL find most other moving companies require YOU to USE a THIRD-PARTY Company to crate these items which is more money OUT of your POCKET. ALL appliances are disconnected and reconnected by US on the DAY of your move with a simply release of liability. Again, a large majority of other moving companies will require YOU to utilize a third party to disconnect large appliances (washer. Dryer. Refrigerator). We DO NOT charge extra for pianos. Organs or fine antiques. In fact. Ellis piano in Hoover has been recommending OUR services since 1983 when we saved the DAY for David on a 4TH floor and highly complex grand piano DELIVERY. OUR team trained directly with Steinway & sons and we are the only recommended piano mover by their organization in north & central Alabama. UAB. Samford. Birmingham southern and Montevallo ALL utilize US when needing a piano moved. What we SAY is what YOU GET! we tend to ASK a FEW more questions from OUR customers because every move requires a different approach. But by getting to know OUR customers and fostering relationships. We know that YOU will END UP becoming a customer for life.

Founded in 1939, Osborne Machinery Movers Inc. is one of the leading providers of machinery and plant moving services in the southeastern United States. Located in Birmingham, Ala., the company's services include machinery moving, plant relocation, crane and equipment rentals, machinery warehousing, custom crating and metal distribution. The company caters to several markets which include machine shops, print shops, foundries, major hospitals, paper mills and automotive manufacturing facilities. The company's equipment includes forklifts with capacities ranging from 4,000 to 80,000 pounds, cranes and other specialized rigging equipment.

We encourage YOU to "ASK around" before making a moving DECISION. ONCE YOU Begin asking the right questions. Then YOU will quickly SEE HOW we quietly became the oldest and most respected moving team in birmingham and the entire southeast by winning over ONE Family AT a TIME. TRANSPARENT billing practices = we DO NOT charge extra for anything!  
 
 
YOU won't find ANY surprises on your final bill which sadly has become a standard within OUR industry. OUR quoted hourly rate is exactly what YOU will END UP paying AT the END of your local MOVE. (TOTAL time X hourly rate = final invoice)   
 
 
OUR competitors will tack on "hidden fees" disguised AS service charges. Fuel surcharges. Delivery fees. Special handling of high value or heavy item charges. "PER step" charges for multilevel houses and apartments and a multitude of other things that we deem unnecessary. Transparency and uniqueness: 
 
 
we disassembled and reassembled ALL Beds and cribs on the DAY of your move. ALL mirrors. Marble tops and glass shelves are removed and carefully wrapped by US on the DAY of your move. YOU'LL find most other moving companies require YOU to USE a THIRD-PARTY Company to crate these items which is more money OUT of your POCKET. ALL appliances are disconnected and reconnected by US on the DAY of your move with a simply release of liability. Again, a large majority of other moving companies will require YOU to utilize a third party to disconnect large appliances (washer. Dryer. Refrigerator). We DO NOT charge extra for pianos. Organs or fine antiques. In fact. Ellis piano in Hoover has been recommending OUR services since 1983 when we saved the DAY for David on a 4TH floor and highly complex grand piano DELIVERY. OUR team trained directly with Steinway & sons and we are the only recommended piano mover by their organization in north & central Alabama. UAB. Samford. Birmingham southern and Montevallo ALL utilize US when needing a piano moved. What we SAY is what YOU GET! we tend to ASK a FEW more questions from OUR customers because every move requires a different approach. But by getting to know OUR customers and fostering relationships. We know that YOU will END UP becoming a customer for life.

If you are moving, PODS containers are an ideal solution. Delivered right to your door, they are available in three sizes. Since PODS containers sit at ground level, loading and unloading items is convenient too. There are no ramps or steps to navigate. With PODS you can take your time (weeks if needed) and alleviate the stress. Once all of your personal belongings are packed and loaded, provide your own lock on the roll-down door and you keep the key. PODS will retrieve the container and transport it to your new home or back to a local Storage Center until you are ready for your belongings to be delivered to your new home. Founded in 1939, Osborne Machinery Movers Inc. is one of the leading providers of machinery and plant moving services in the southeastern United States. Located in Birmingham, Ala., the company's services include machinery moving, plant relocation, crane and equipment rentals, machinery warehousing, custom crating and metal distribution. The company caters to several markets which include machine shops, print shops, foundries, major hospitals, paper mills and automotive manufacturing facilities. The company's equipment includes forklifts with capacities ranging from 4,000 to 80,000 pounds, cranes and other specialized rigging equipment.

We encourage YOU to "ASK around" before making a moving DECISION. ONCE YOU Begin asking the right questions. Then YOU will quickly SEE HOW we quietly became the oldest and most respected moving team in birmingham and the entire southeast by winning over ONE Family AT a TIME. TRANSPARENT billing practices = we DO NOT charge extra for anything!  
 
 
YOU won't find ANY surprises on your final bill which sadly has become a standard within OUR industry. OUR quoted hourly rate is exactly what YOU will END UP paying AT the END of your local MOVE. (TOTAL time X hourly rate = final invoice)   
 
 
OUR competitors will tack on "hidden fees" disguised AS service charges. Fuel surcharges. Delivery fees. Special handling of high value or heavy item charges. "PER step" charges for multilevel houses and apartments and a multitude of other things that we deem unnecessary. Transparency and uniqueness: 
 
 
we disassembled and reassembled ALL Beds and cribs on the DAY of your move. ALL mirrors. Marble tops and glass shelves are removed and carefully wrapped by US on the DAY of your move. YOU'LL find most other moving companies require YOU to USE a THIRD-PARTY Company to crate these items which is more money OUT of your POCKET. ALL appliances are disconnected and reconnected by US on the DAY of your move with a simply release of liability. Again, a large majority of other moving companies will require YOU to utilize a third party to disconnect large appliances (washer. Dryer. Refrigerator). We DO NOT charge extra for pianos. Organs or fine antiques. In fact. Ellis piano in Hoover has been recommending OUR services since 1983 when we saved the DAY for David on a 4TH floor and highly complex grand piano DELIVERY. OUR team trained directly with Steinway & sons and we are the only recommended piano mover by their organization in north & central Alabama. UAB. Samford. Birmingham southern and Montevallo ALL utilize US when needing a piano moved. What we SAY is what YOU GET! we tend to ASK a FEW more questions from OUR customers because every move requires a different approach. But by getting to know OUR customers and fostering relationships. We know that YOU will END UP becoming a customer for life.

Remodeling your home and need a place to store your furniture or excess household items?  Putting your home up for sale? A PODS container can provide you with a secure storage option to store extra belongings so you can renovate or stage your home with ease! PODS containers are not only affordable, they are convenient. You can store onsite or in one of our secure PODS storage centers. You decide how long you will keep your PODS storage container and when you will need it back. 
If you are moving, PODS containers are an ideal solution. Delivered right to your door, they are available in three sizes. Since PODS containers sit at ground level, loading and unloading items is convenient too. There are no ramps or steps to navigate. With PODS you can take your time (weeks if needed) and alleviate the stress. Once all of your personal belongings are packed and loaded, provide your own lock on the roll-down door and you keep the key. PODS will retrieve the container and transport it to your new home or back to a local Storage Center until you are ready for your belongings to be delivered to your new home. PODS offers 24-hour service, it takes just one telephone call for re-delivery of the PODS container and your belongings – across town or across the country.

Founded in 1939, Osborne Machinery Movers Inc. is one of the leading providers of machinery and plant moving services in the southeastern United States. Located in Birmingham, Ala., the company's services include machinery moving, plant relocation, crane and equipment rentals, machinery warehousing, custom crating and metal distribution. The company caters to several markets which include machine shops, print shops, foundries, major hospitals, paper mills and automotive manufacturing facilities. The company's equipment includes forklifts with capacities ranging from 4,000 to 80,000 pounds, cranes and other specialized rigging equipment.

We encourage YOU to "ASK around" before making a moving DECISION. ONCE YOU Begin asking the right questions. Then YOU will quickly SEE HOW we quietly became the oldest and most respected moving team in birmingham and the entire southeast by winning over ONE Family AT a TIME. TRANSPARENT billing practices = we DO NOT charge extra for anything!  
 
 
YOU won't find ANY surprises on your final bill which sadly has become a standard within OUR industry. OUR quoted hourly rate is exactly what YOU will END UP paying AT the END of your local MOVE. (TOTAL time X hourly rate = final invoice)   
 
 
OUR competitors will tack on "hidden fees" disguised AS service charges. Fuel surcharges. Delivery fees. Special handling of high value or heavy item charges. "PER step" charges for multilevel houses and apartments and a multitude of other things that we deem unnecessary. Transparency and uniqueness: 
 
 
we disassembled and reassembled ALL Beds and cribs on the DAY of your move. ALL mirrors. Marble tops and glass shelves are removed and carefully wrapped by US on the DAY of your move. YOU'LL find most other moving companies require YOU to USE a THIRD-PARTY Company to crate these items which is more money OUT of your POCKET. ALL appliances are disconnected and reconnected by US on the DAY of your move with a simply release of liability. Again, a large majority of other moving companies will require YOU to utilize a third party to disconnect large appliances (washer. Dryer. Refrigerator). We DO NOT charge extra for pianos. Organs or fine antiques. In fact. Ellis piano in Hoover has been recommending OUR services since 1983 when we saved the DAY for David on a 4TH floor and highly complex grand piano DELIVERY. OUR team trained directly with Steinway & sons and we are the only recommended piano mover by their organization in north & central Alabama. UAB. Samford. Birmingham southern and Montevallo ALL utilize US when needing a piano moved. What we SAY is what YOU GET! we tend to ASK a FEW more questions from OUR customers because every move requires a different approach. But by getting to know OUR customers and fostering relationships. We know that YOU will END UP becoming a customer for life.

Remodeling your home and need a place to store your furniture or excess household items?  Putting your home up for sale? A PODS container can provide you with a secure storage option to store extra belongings so you can renovate or stage your home with ease! PODS containers are not only affordable, they are convenient. You can store onsite or in one of our secure PODS storage centers. You decide how long you will keep your PODS storage container and when you will need it back. 
If you are moving, PODS containers are an ideal solution. Delivered right to your door, they are available in three sizes. Since PODS containers sit at ground level, loading and unloading items is convenient too. There are no ramps or steps to navigate. With PODS you can take your time (weeks if needed) and alleviate the stress. Once all of your personal belongings are packed and loaded, provide your own lock on the roll-down door and you keep the key. PODS will retrieve the container and transport it to your new home or back to a local Storage Center until you are ready for your belongings to be delivered to your new home. PODS offers 24-hour service, it takes just one telephone call for re-delivery of the PODS container and your belongings – across town or across the country.

Founded in 1939, Osborne Machinery Movers Inc. is one of the leading providers of machinery and plant moving services in the southeastern United States. Located in Birmingham, Ala., the company's services include machinery moving, plant relocation, crane and equipment rentals, machinery warehousing, custom crating and metal distribution. The company caters to several markets which include machine shops, print shops, foundries, major hospitals, paper mills and automotive manufacturing facilities. The company's equipment includes forklifts with capacities ranging from 4,000 to 80,000 pounds, cranes and other specialized rigging equipment.

We encourage YOU to "ASK around" before making a moving DECISION. ONCE YOU Begin asking the right questions. Then YOU will quickly SEE HOW we quietly became the oldest and most respected moving team in birmingham and the entire southeast by winning over ONE Family AT a TIME. TRANSPARENT billing practices = we DO NOT charge extra for anything!  
 
 
YOU won't find ANY surprises on your final bill which sadly has become a standard within OUR industry. OUR quoted hourly rate is exactly what YOU will END UP paying AT the END of your local MOVE. (TOTAL time X hourly rate = final invoice)   
 
 
OUR competitors will tack on "hidden fees" disguised AS service charges. Fuel surcharges. Delivery fees. Special handling of high value or heavy item charges. "PER step" charges for multilevel houses and apartments and a multitude of other things that we deem unnecessary. Transparency and uniqueness: 
 
 
we disassembled and reassembled ALL Beds and cribs on the DAY of your move. ALL mirrors. Marble tops and glass shelves are removed and carefully wrapped by US on the DAY of your move. YOU'LL find most other moving companies require YOU to USE a THIRD-PARTY Company to crate these items which is more money OUT of your POCKET. ALL appliances are disconnected and reconnected by US on the DAY of your move with a simply release of liability. Again, a large majority of other moving companies will require YOU to utilize a third party to disconnect large appliances (washer. Dryer. Refrigerator). We DO NOT charge extra for pianos. Organs or fine antiques. In fact. Ellis piano in Hoover has been recommending OUR services since 1983 when we saved the DAY for David on a 4TH floor and highly complex grand piano DELIVERY. OUR team trained directly with Steinway & sons and we are the only recommended piano mover by their organization in north & central Alabama. UAB. Samford. Birmingham southern and Montevallo ALL utilize US when needing a piano moved. What we SAY is what YOU GET! we tend to ASK a FEW more questions from OUR customers because every move requires a different approach. But by getting to know OUR customers and fostering relationships. We know that YOU will END UP becoming a customer for life.

If you are moving, PODS containers are an ideal solution. Delivered right to your door, they are available in three sizes. Since PODS containers sit at ground level, loading and unloading items is convenient too. There are no ramps or steps to navigate. With PODS you can take your time (weeks if needed) and alleviate the stress. Once all of your personal belongings are packed and loaded, provide your own lock on the roll-down door and you keep the key. PODS will retrieve the container and transport it to your new home or back to a local Storage Center until you are ready for your belongings to be delivered to your new home. PODS offers 24-hour service, it takes just one telephone call for re-delivery of the PODS container and your belongings – across town or across the country.

Founded in 1939, Osborne Machinery Movers Inc. is one of the leading providers of machinery and plant moving services in the southeastern United States. Located in Birmingham, Ala., the company's services include machinery moving, plant relocation, crane and equipment rentals, machinery warehousing, custom crating and metal distribution. The company caters to several markets which include machine shops, print shops, foundries, major hospitals, paper mills and automotive manufacturing facilities. We encourage YOU to "ASK around" before making a moving DECISION. ONCE YOU Begin asking the right questions. Then YOU will quickly SEE HOW we quietly became the oldest and most respected moving team in birmingham and the entire southeast by winning over ONE Family AT a TIME. TRANSPARENT billing practices = we DO NOT charge extra for anything!  
 
 
YOU won't find ANY surprises on your final bill which sadly has become a standard within OUR industry. OUR quoted hourly rate is exactly what YOU will END UP paying AT the END of your local MOVE. (TOTAL time X hourly rate = final invoice)   
 
 
OUR competitors will tack on "hidden fees" disguised AS service charges. Fuel surcharges. Delivery fees. Special handling of high value or heavy item charges. "PER step" charges for multilevel houses and apartments and a multitude of other things that we deem unnecessary. Transparency and uniqueness: 
 
 
we disassembled and reassembled ALL Beds and cribs on the DAY of your move. ALL mirrors. Marble tops and glass shelves are removed and carefully wrapped by US on the DAY of your move. YOU'LL find most other moving companies require YOU to USE a THIRD-PARTY Company to crate these items which is more money OUT of your POCKET. ALL appliances are disconnected and reconnected by US on the DAY of your move with a simply release of liability. Again, a large majority of other moving companies will require YOU to utilize a third party to disconnect large appliances (washer. Dryer. Refrigerator). We DO NOT charge extra for pianos. Organs or fine antiques. In fact. Ellis piano in Hoover has been recommending OUR services since 1983 when we saved the DAY for David on a 4TH floor and highly complex grand piano DELIVERY. OUR team trained directly with Steinway & sons and we are the only recommended piano mover by their organization in north & central Alabama. UAB. Samford. Birmingham southern and Montevallo ALL utilize US when needing a piano moved. What we SAY is what YOU GET! we tend to ASK a FEW more questions from OUR customers because every move requires a different approach. But by getting to know OUR customers and fostering relationships. We know that YOU will END UP becoming a customer for life.

If you are moving, PODS containers are an ideal solution. Delivered right to your door, they are available in three sizes. Since PODS containers sit at ground level, loading and unloading items is convenient too. There are no ramps or steps to navigate. Founded in 1939, Osborne Machinery Movers Inc. is one of the leading providers of machinery and plant moving services in the southeastern United States. Located in Birmingham, Ala., the company's services include machinery moving, plant relocation, crane and equipment rentals, machinery warehousing, custom crating and metal distribution. The company caters to several markets which include machine shops, print shops, foundries, major hospitals, paper mills and automotive manufacturing facilities. The company's equipment includes forklifts with capacities ranging from 4,000 to 80,000 pounds, cranes and other specialized rigging equipment.

We encourage YOU to "ASK around" before making a moving DECISION. ONCE YOU Begin asking the right questions. Then YOU will quickly SEE HOW we quietly became the oldest and most respected moving team in birmingham and the entire southeast by winning over ONE Family AT a TIME. TRANSPARENT billing practices = we DO NOT charge extra for anything!  
 
 
YOU won't find ANY surprises on your final bill which sadly has become a standard within OUR industry. OUR quoted hourly rate is exactly what YOU will END UP paying AT the END of your local MOVE. (TOTAL time X hourly rate = final invoice)   
 
 
OUR competitors will tack on "hidden fees" disguised AS service charges. Fuel surcharges. Delivery fees. Special handling of high value or heavy item charges. "PER step" charges for multilevel houses and apartments and a multitude of other things that we deem unnecessary. Transparency and uniqueness: 
 
 
we disassembled and reassembled ALL Beds and cribs on the DAY of your move. ALL mirrors. Marble tops and glass shelves are removed and carefully wrapped by US on the DAY of your move. YOU'LL find most other moving companies require YOU to USE a THIRD-PARTY Company to crate these items which is more money OUT of your POCKET. ALL appliances are disconnected and reconnected by US on the DAY of your move with a simply release of liability. Again, a large majority of other moving companies will require YOU to utilize a third party to disconnect large appliances (washer. Dryer. Refrigerator). We DO NOT charge extra for pianos. Organs or fine antiques. In fact. Ellis piano in Hoover has been recommending OUR services since 1983 when we saved the DAY for David on a 4TH floor and highly complex grand piano DELIVERY. OUR team trained directly with Steinway & sons and we are the only recommended piano mover by their organization in north & central Alabama. UAB. Samford. Birmingham southern and Montevallo ALL utilize US when needing a piano moved. What we SAY is what YOU GET! we tend to ASK a FEW more questions from OUR customers because every move requires a different approach. But by getting to know OUR customers and fostering relationships. We know that YOU will END UP becoming a customer for life.

Founded in 1939, Osborne Machinery Movers Inc. is one of the leading providers of machinery and plant moving services in the southeastern United States. Located in Birmingham, Ala., the company's services include machinery moving, plant relocation, crane and equipment rentals, machinery warehousing, custom crating and metal distribution. The company caters to several markets which include machine shops, print shops, foundries, major hospitals, paper mills and automotive manufacturing facilities. The company's equipment includes forklifts with capacities ranging from 4,000 to 80,000 pounds, cranes and other specialized rigging equipment.

We encourage YOU to "ASK around" before making a moving DECISION. ONCE YOU Begin asking the right questions. Then YOU will quickly SEE HOW we quietly became the oldest and most respected moving team in birmingham and the entire southeast by winning over ONE Family AT a TIME. TRANSPARENT billing practices = we DO NOT charge extra for anything!  
 
 
YOU won't find ANY surprises on your final bill which sadly has become a standard within OUR industry. OUR quoted hourly rate is exactly what YOU will END UP paying AT the END of your local MOVE. (TOTAL time X hourly rate = final invoice)   
 
 
OUR competitors will tack on "hidden fees" disguised AS service charges. Fuel surcharges. Delivery fees. Special handling of high value or heavy item charges. "PER step" charges for multilevel houses and apartments and a multitude of other things that we deem unnecessary. Transparency and uniqueness: 
 
 
we disassembled and reassembled ALL Beds and cribs on the DAY of your move. ALL mirrors. Marble tops and glass shelves are removed and carefully wrapped by US on the DAY of your move. YOU'LL find most other moving companies require YOU to USE a THIRD-PARTY Company to crate these items which is more money OUT of your POCKET. ALL appliances are disconnected and reconnected by US on the DAY of your move with a simply release of liability. Again, a large majority of other moving companies will require YOU to utilize a third party to disconnect large appliances (washer. Dryer. Refrigerator). We DO NOT charge extra for pianos. Organs or fine antiques. In fact. Ellis piano in Hoover has been recommending OUR services since 1983 when we saved the DAY for David on a 4TH floor and highly complex grand piano DELIVERY. OUR team trained directly with Steinway & sons and we are the only recommended piano mover by their organization in north & central Alabama. UAB. Samford. Birmingham southern and Montevallo ALL utilize US when needing a piano moved. What we SAY is what YOU GET! we tend to ASK a FEW more questions from OUR customers because every move requires a different approach. But by getting to know OUR customers and fostering relationships. We know that YOU will END UP becoming a customer for life.

Founded in 1939, Osborne Machinery Movers Inc. is one of the leading providers of machinery and plant moving services in the southeastern United States. Located in Birmingham, Ala., the company's services include machinery moving, plant relocation, crane and equipment rentals, machinery warehousing, custom crating and metal distribution. The company caters to several markets which include machine shops, print shops, foundries, major hospitals, paper mills and automotive manufacturing facilities. The company's equipment includes forklifts with capacities ranging from 4,000 to 80,000 pounds, cranes and other specialized rigging equipment.

We encourage YOU to "ASK around" before making a moving DECISION. ONCE YOU Begin asking the right questions. Then YOU will quickly SEE HOW we quietly became the oldest and most respected moving team in birmingham and the entire southeast by winning over ONE Family AT a TIME. TRANSPARENT billing practices = we DO NOT charge extra for anything!  
 
 
YOU won't find ANY surprises on your final bill which sadly has become a standard within OUR industry. OUR quoted hourly rate is exactly what YOU will END UP paying AT the END of your local MOVE. (TOTAL time X hourly rate = final invoice)   
 
 
OUR competitors will tack on "hidden fees" disguised AS service charges. Fuel surcharges. Delivery fees. Special handling of high value or heavy item charges. "PER step" charges for multilevel houses and apartments and a multitude of other things that we deem unnecessary. Transparency and uniqueness: 
 
 
we disassembled and reassembled ALL Beds and cribs on the DAY of your move. ALL mirrors. Marble tops and glass shelves are removed and carefully wrapped by US on the DAY of your move. YOU'LL find most other moving companies require YOU to USE a THIRD-PARTY Company to crate these items which is more money OUT of your POCKET. ALL appliances are disconnected and reconnected by US on the DAY of your move with a simply release of liability. Again, a large majority of other moving companies will require YOU to utilize a third party to disconnect large appliances (washer. Dryer. Refrigerator). We DO NOT charge extra for pianos. Organs or fine antiques. In fact. Ellis piano in Hoover has been recommending OUR services since 1983 when we saved the DAY for David on a 4TH floor and highly complex grand piano DELIVERY. OUR team trained directly with Steinway & sons and we are the only recommended piano mover by their organization in north & central Alabama. UAB. Samford. Birmingham southern and Montevallo ALL utilize US when needing a piano moved. What we SAY is what YOU GET! we tend to ASK a FEW more questions from OUR customers because every move requires a different approach. But by getting to know OUR customers and fostering relationships. We know that YOU will END UP becoming a customer for life.

A PODS container can provide you with a secure storage option to store extra belongings so you can renovate or stage your home with ease! PODS containers are not only affordable, they are convenient. You can store onsite or in one of our secure PODS storage centers. You decide how long you will keep your PODS storage container and when you will need it back. 
If you are moving, PODS containers are an ideal solution. Delivered right to your door, they are available in three sizes. Since PODS containers sit at ground level, loading and unloading items is convenient too. There are no ramps or steps to navigate. With PODS you can take your time (weeks if needed) and alleviate the stress. Once all of your personal belongings are packed and loaded, provide your own lock on the roll-down door and you keep the key. PODS will retrieve the container and transport it to your new home or back to a local Storage Center until you are ready for your belongings to be delivered to your new home. PODS offers 24-hour service, it takes just one telephone call for re-delivery of the PODS container and your belongings – across town or across the country.

Founded in 1939, Osborne Machinery Movers Inc. is one of the leading providers of machinery and plant moving services in the southeastern United States. Located in Birmingham, Ala., the company's services include machinery moving, plant relocation, crane and equipment rentals, machinery warehousing, custom crating and metal distribution. The company caters to several markets which include machine shops, print shops, foundries, major hospitals, paper mills and automotive manufacturing facilities. The company's equipment includes forklifts with capacities ranging from 4,000 to 80,000 pounds, cranes and other specialized rigging equipment.

We encourage YOU to "ASK around" before making a moving DECISION. ONCE YOU Begin asking the right questions. Then YOU will quickly SEE HOW we quietly became the oldest and most respected moving team in birmingham and the entire southeast by winning over ONE Family AT a TIME. TRANSPARENT billing practices = we DO NOT charge extra for anything!  
 
 
YOU won't find ANY surprises on your final bill which sadly has become a standard within OUR industry. OUR quoted hourly rate is exactly what YOU will END UP paying AT the END of your local MOVE. (TOTAL time X hourly rate = final invoice)   
 
 
OUR competitors will tack on "hidden fees" disguised AS service charges. Fuel surcharges. Delivery fees. Special handling of high value or heavy item charges. "PER step" charges for multilevel houses and apartments and a multitude of other things that we deem unnecessary. Transparency and uniqueness: 
 
 
we disassembled and reassembled ALL Beds and cribs on the DAY of your move. ALL mirrors. Marble tops and glass shelves are removed and carefully wrapped by US on the DAY of your move. YOU'LL find most other moving companies require YOU to USE a THIRD-PARTY Company to crate these items which is more money OUT of your POCKET. ALL appliances are disconnected and reconnected by US on the DAY of your move with a simply release of liability. Again, a large majority of other moving companies will require YOU to utilize a third party to disconnect large appliances (washer. Dryer. Refrigerator). We DO NOT charge extra for pianos. Organs or fine antiques. In fact. Ellis piano in Hoover has been recommending OUR services since 1983 when we saved the DAY for David on a 4TH floor and highly complex grand piano DELIVERY. OUR team trained directly with Steinway & sons and we are the only recommended piano mover by their organization in north & central Alabama. UAB. Samford. Birmingham southern and Montevallo ALL utilize US when needing a piano moved. What we SAY is what YOU GET! we tend to ASK a FEW more questions from OUR customers because every move requires a different approach. But by getting to know OUR customers and fostering relationships. We know that YOU will END UP becoming a customer for life.

Founded in 1939, Osborne Machinery Movers Inc. is one of the leading providers of machinery and plant moving services in the southeastern United States. Located in Birmingham, Ala., the company's services include machinery moving, plant relocation, crane and equipment rentals, machinery warehousing, custom crating and metal distribution. The company caters to several markets which include machine shops, print shops, foundries, major hospitals, paper mills and automotive manufacturing facilities. The company's equipment includes forklifts with capacities ranging from 4,000 to 80,000 pounds, cranes and other specialized rigging equipment.

We encourage YOU to "ASK around" before making a moving DECISION. ONCE YOU Begin asking the right questions. Then YOU will quickly SEE HOW we quietly became the oldest and most respected moving team in birmingham and the entire southeast by winning over ONE Family AT a TIME. TRANSPARENT billing practices = we DO NOT charge extra for anything!  
 
 
YOU won't find ANY surprises on your final bill which sadly has become a standard within OUR industry. OUR quoted hourly rate is exactly what YOU will END UP paying AT the END of your local MOVE. (TOTAL time X hourly rate = final invoice)   
 
 
OUR competitors will tack on "hidden fees" disguised AS service charges. Fuel surcharges. Delivery fees. Special handling of high value or heavy item charges. "PER step" charges for multilevel houses and apartments and a multitude of other things that we deem unnecessary. Transparency and uniqueness: 
 
 
we disassembled and reassembled ALL Beds and cribs on the DAY of your move. ALL mirrors. Marble tops and glass shelves are removed and carefully wrapped by US on the DAY of your move. YOU'LL find most other moving companies require YOU to USE a THIRD-PARTY Company to crate these items which is more money OUT of your POCKET. ALL appliances are disconnected and reconnected by US on the DAY of your move with a simply release of liability. Again, a large majority of other moving companies will require YOU to utilize a third party to disconnect large appliances (washer. Dryer. Refrigerator). We DO NOT charge extra for pianos. Organs or fine antiques. In fact. Ellis piano in Hoover has been recommending OUR services since 1983 when we saved the DAY for David on a 4TH floor and highly complex grand piano DELIVERY. OUR team trained directly with Steinway & sons and we are the only recommended piano mover by their organization in north & central Alabama. UAB. Samford. Birmingham southern and Montevallo ALL utilize US when needing a piano moved. What we SAY is what YOU GET! we tend to ASK a FEW more questions from OUR customers because every move requires a different approach. But by getting to know OUR customers and fostering relationships. We know that YOU will END UP becoming a customer for life.

If you are moving, PODS containers are an ideal solution. Delivered right to your door, they are available in three sizes. Since PODS containers sit at ground level, loading and unloading items is convenient too. There are no ramps or steps to navigate. Once all of your personal belongings are packed and loaded, provide your own lock on the roll-down door and you keep the key. We are the moving company to call for one-stop shopping for all types of moving services for homes, condos, town homes, apartments, & offices. Traditional move with additional stops, customer packs their own belongings & we move your belongings & furniture with additional stops between pick-up & drop-off destinations. Pack-Move-Unp ack, we pack, move & unpack your belongings & funiture. Load only, we load your already packed belongings & furniture into your rented moving truck, enclosed trailer, or storage container. Pack & load, we pack & load your belongings & furniture into your rented moving truck, enclosed trailer, or storage container. Unload only, we unload your belongings & furniture from your rented moving truck, enclosed trailer, or storage container.

Founded in 1955, DMS Moving Systems offers a range of relocation solutions for office complexes and residential and industrial units. It provides specialized transportation, logistics assistance, household goods relocation, and temporary and long-term storage services. The company employs a work force of more than 800 people and maintains operations in the United States, Canada and Mexico, as well as over 140 countries worldwide. It offers air and ocean freight, vehicle shipment, documentation preparation and customs clearance services. DMS Moving Systems also provides on-site supervision, loading, unloading, labeling, tagging, packing and crating solutions. It is an interstate agent for Atlas Van Lines. The company is a member of the American Moving and Storage Association and the Registered International Mover. It has achieved ISO 9001:2000 certification. DMS Moving Systems transports specialty items, such as medical equipment, lasers, robotics, assembly cells, and prototype and concept units on trailers. It additionally offers online claims forms.
